item.title: C 内敛汇编
item.description:
如果要将多条语句放在一个asm关键字中, 每条语句之间必须使用分隔符, 常见的为
	. 例如: asm volatile( "isb 
	" "dsb 
	" "eret 
	" ); 貌似对于 arm 汇编, 只用 
 也OK? TODO: 找到依据 volatile cc This stands for “condition codes”. Since the add instruction will affect the carry flag amongst other things, we need to tell gcc about it. Otherwise it might want to split a test-and-branch around our code. If it did so, the branch might go the wrong way due to the condition codes being corrupted.
